source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_00<tab>The flighty behavior of his precious butterfly weighs heavy on Keimei's heart.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_00<tab>クガネのケイメイは、相談したいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_01<tab>With no small degree of pride, Master Keimei informs you that Kotocho has risen from the ashes and reclaimed her former position of geiko, having completed her second apprenticeship in record time. Furthermore, in recognition of her efforts, she has received an invitation to perform at the annual Kugane-odori, known as the event where stars of the flower district are made. Not all is well, however─as Keimei tells it, his butterfly is acting curiously despondent despite the joyous news, going so far as to refuse his offer to commission a new dress for her to commemorate the occasion. At the young master's behest, you make for the flower district in hopes of finding out what troubles the girl and easing her heart as best you can.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_01<tab>芸子に復帰することが決まったコトチョウが、ケイメイの祝儀を断っているという。その原因を探るよう、ケイメイから依頼された。クガネの三条花街にいる「コトチョウ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_02<tab>A brief heart-to-heart with Kotocho sheds light upon the nature of her plight. The girl tearfully describes how her sole source of comfort as she toiled and struggled was her dream that she would once again stand on the same stage as Kototsuru, and finally prove her worth to her mentor and role model. Though the butterfly has risen back through the ranks, Kototsuru's impending marriage and retirement from the flower district means this dream will not come to be. Unable to summon the passion she once had, Kotocho asks to be left alone with her thoughts. At a loss, you acquiesce to the girl's request and head back to share what you have learned with Master Keimei.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_02<tab>コトチョウと話した。コトツルの引退が決まり、一生、姉芸子を追い抜けなくなったことで、コトチョウは自暴自棄になっているようだ。楽座街の「ケイメイ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_03<tab>You share what you have learned with Keimei, who is quickly spurred to action. As Kotocho's patron, he reaffirms his vow to support the girl in this, her time of greatest need. To that end, he would take it upon himself to convince Kototsuru to put off her planned retirement until after she has taken part in one final performance. You make for the artisans' quarter, determined to assist in whatever what you can.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_03<tab>ケイメイに報告した。姉芸子コトツルに、コトチョウの復帰舞台「クガネをどり」に出演するよう依頼することになった。クガネの第一波止場にいる「コトツル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_04<tab>The heartfelt pleas of Master Keimei and yourself do not fall on deaf ears, and Kototsuru agrees to your request. She does, however, set one absolute condition: the two geiko must perform the same number─an ancient Doman dance known as the tennyo-no-mai, or descent of the angel─while wearing identical dresses, which you are to fashion. Believing this the only way to raise Kotocho's spirits, the two of you thank Kototsuru for her kindness before returning to Daitenya to prepare the ancient garment─the tennyo hagoromo─needed for the occasion.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_04<tab>コトツルと話して、「クガネをどり」への出演の約束を取り付けた。そのための条件は、コトチョウとコトツルが同じ衣装で、同じ舞を披露すること。楽座街の「ケイメイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_05<tab>Upon your return to Daitenya, Keimei tells Kotocho the news, renewing her vigor and encouraging her to resume training. He further explains that he has prepared the finest silks at his disposal for what will doubtless prove to be your most significant and challenging work to date. When you are ready to brandish your needle, you need only speak with the stall attendant and claim the fabrics you desire.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_05<tab>ケイメイと話した。姉芸子コトツルと最後の勝負ができると知ったコトチョウは、さっそく稽古に入った。一方、ケイメイからは、「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2460401 /var>」2着の製作を依頼された。楽座街の「ヤギリ」と話し、材料「<var 28 ((Item)) F2460301 /var>」を受け取ろう。

source:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_06As he hands over the squares of pristine, angelic silks, the attendant muses on how the choice of dance is truly fitting for Kototsuru's final performance, given her deep respect for cultural tradition, and a worthy challenge for the young Kotocho as well. It would seem all are eager to see past, present, and future come together on the stage at the Kugane-odori. You take your needle in hand, vowing to create twin masterpieces worthy of the grand occasion.

※In the event you lose the ingredients or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Yagiri.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_06ヤギリから、必要な材料を受け取った。「」を2着製作して、楽座街の「ケイメイ」に納品しよう。

※「」を失った場合は、ヤギリに話しかけましょう。材料を入手し、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_07<tab>After presenting your work to Master Keimei, you make your way to the festivities just as Kototsuru and Kotocho are about to take the stage. Together with the young master, you look on in wonder as the two geiko twirl and sway in perfect harmony, as if their two physical bodies shared a single soul. You wake from this otherworldly dream to welcome the two, who thank you profusely for crafting the garments so sublime it was as if they were truly transformed into heavenly beings. They share a moment of tenderness as Kotocho thanks her mentor for all that she has done, and Kototsuru entrusts the future of the flower district to her erstwhile apprentice. You and Keimei look on warmly as the two geiko reaffirm a bond that will surely last for the rest of their lives, even as their paths diverge.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_07<tab>ケイメイに、<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F2460401 /var>を納品した。コトチョウとコトツルは、素晴らしい舞を披露した。冒険者が作成した衣装は、ふたりの芸子の魅力を一層引き立て、「クガネをどり」は大成功に終わった。楽座街の「ケイメイ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_08<tab>Your work done, you pay one final visit to Daitenya, where Master Keimei expresses his deep appreciation for all that you have done on his and Kotocho's behalf. He expresses his confidence that the flower district is in good hands with his butterfly, and wishes you a safe journey back to Eorzea, where he hopes that Hingan fashions might one day make an impression the way your craftsmanship has found an audience in his homeland.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_SEQ_08<tab>ケイメイと話した。ふたりの芸子の勝負は、引き分けだった。コトチョウは、冒険者が仕立てた「ドレス」とコトツルから受け継いだ着物に身を包み、もてなしの心で、花街を背負っていくことだろう。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, I have the most wonderful news: our butterfly is a geiko once more! They say Kotocho devoted herself to even the most menial of her tasks with such diligence that she quickly won over even the strictest of her seniors.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、よく来てくれました！
コトチョウは、心を入れ替えて下働きに励みました。
おかげで、早くも芸子に返り咲くことになりましたよ！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_001<tab>She will make her triumphant return at the Kugane-odori: the greatest spectacle in our fair city, where veteran geiko and fledgling maiko alike take the stage in a vivid display of all the cultural riches the Hanamachi has to offer.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_001復帰は、年に一度の「クガネをどり」。
舞子も芸子も総出で行われる、それは華やかな舞踏公演で、
クガネ中の人々が見物に集まる、三条花街の最大の催しです。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_002<tab>The festivities are held once each year, and as tradition goes, the geiko who earns the highest acclaim takes her place atop the flower district until such time as she is dethroned at a future event. As you might imagine, Kototsuru has held that position since...well, since as long as I can remember.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_002この公演で、もっとも高い評価を受けた芸子が、
一番人気として、花街を引っ張っていくことになります。
もちろん、ここ数年は、コトツルの独壇場でした。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_003<tab>There has, however, been a most unexpected turn of events. Just the other day, Kototsuru announced that she will not only be withdrawing from the festivities, but retiring from the Hanamachi altogether. Rumor has it that she is to be wed.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_003ところが、突然、コトツルが結婚のため引退を表明し、
今回の「クガネをどり」の出演を辞退してしまったのです！
コトチョウの復帰が早まったのも、その影響でしょう……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_004<tab>The suddenness of it all has the flower district in state of disarray. That said, this could very well be the chance of a lifetime for our butterfly! So I thought, at least─yet for reasons I cannot comprehend, when I asked what she would wear this time, she simply lowered her head and walked away.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_004コトツル不在なら、コトチョウが頂点に立つのも夢ではない！
さっそく、晴れ舞台に向けて、彼女に贈り物を申し出たところ、
固辞されてしまいました……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_005<tab>It is entirely unlike the girl to be so glum on the eve of what very well might be the chance of a lifetime. Is it possible she harbors a worry that she is ashamed to discuss with me? I cannot say, but I would be ever so grateful if you could talk with her in my stead.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_005むしろ、念願の復帰を控えた今の方が、落ち込んでいる様子。
私では、あの子が強がって本心を明かさないでしょうから、
三条花街に赴き、「コトチョウ」と話してみてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_009<tab>It simply isn't like Kotocho to brood and repine like this. The girl refuses to open her heart to me, but perhaps you might succeed where I have not.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_009コトチョウは、念願の復帰を控えた今の方が、落ち込んでいる様子。
私では、強がって本心を明かさないでしょうから、
三条花街に赴き、あの子と話してみてもらえませんか？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_010<tab>Oh, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Have you come to congratulate me on my promotion? You are always so kind. Sadly, I am afraid I'm not much in the mood for celebration.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_010)) (( )) 02 /var>はん、来てくれはったんどすな。
下働きをようけ気張ったおかげで、芸子に戻れそうどす。
……せやけど、わて、もう力が湧かへん。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_011<tab>Thank you, friend, but you have heard the news, yes? Kototsuru is leaving the Hanamachi, never to return. However can this be...?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_011コトツル姉さんが引退してまうんどすえ……。
子どものころ、「クガネをどり」で見た姉さんの舞に感動して、
わて、今の置屋におしかけてん。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_012<tab>It embarrasses me to say this, but were it not for Kototsuru, I would not be the geiko I am today. As a child, I saw her twirl across the stage at the Kugane-odori, and it moved me as nothing I had seen before. In that instant, I <var 1A 02 /var>knew<var 1A 01 /var>─I would give anything to dance beside her one day.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_012それで、姉さんの下について芸子のイロハを教わって、
終いには、姉妹の御盃まで交わしてもろて……。
しんどいこともあったけど……幸せどした。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_013<tab>At the bugyo's banquet, my dream was finally realized. In the end, my performance was not worthy of sharing the same stage. And yet still, deep down, the little girl inside me was giddy as could be.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_013園遊会での勝負かて、嬉しゅうて全力で気張ったのに……。
わてときたら……姉さんの足下にも及ばんかった。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_014<tab>This is what sustained me as I scrubbed the floors and folded the kimono of girls years my junior─knowing that if I did what was asked of me, the day would come that I could once more stand next to she who taught me everything, and this time prove my true worth!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_014せやから、早いとこ姉さんと同じ舞台に立ちとうて、
下働きも稽古も気張って、やっと好機を掴んだ思うたんどす。
でも、わての夢は、もう一生かなわんくなったわ……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHOU_000_015<tab>
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHOU_000_015<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCYO_000_015<tab>
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCYO_000_015<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_015<tab>...But now that day will never come. And so I have told the young master I will have need of his gifts no longer. To take the stage with this empty heart would only bring shame to him─and to the flower district itself.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_015こんな気持ちじゃ、若旦那にも失礼やと思うて、
祝いの贈り物も、断らせていただいたんどす。
いえ……ほかのお客さんにも、花街にも失礼やわ！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_016<tab>You have been most kind to me, but I would be alone with my thoughts for a while. Tell Master Keimei I am sorry.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_016)) (( )) 02 /var>はん、今日のところは帰ってくれへんか？
これからのこと、ひとりで考えさせておくれやす。
かんにんな……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_019<tab>I know not what path I will walk from here, but I would be alone with my thoughts for a while. Pray forgive me.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_019これからのこと、ひとりで考えさせておくれやす。
かんにんな……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_020<tab>Oh, thank the kami you return! You have spoken with my butterfly, yes? What is it that pains her?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_020)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
コトチョウの様子は、いかがでしたか？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_021<tab>...I see. Without her rival and role model to bring her focus, Kotocho has lost the will to go on. The poor girl...why must she torture herself so?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_021なるほど、コトツル引退のせいで目標を見失い、
自暴自棄になってしまっているようですね……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_022<tab>That said, it is quite like her. Once she has set her mind to something, she is not easily swayed by the words of others. It can be one of her most endearing qualities─and, at times like this, one of her most frustrating.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_022こうと決めたら、全力で取り組むコトチョウらしい……。
そんなところが長所だと思っていましたが、
今回は短所となってしまったようです。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_023<tab>As the girl's patron, it is my duty to support her in any way I am able. To this point, this has mostly taken the form of tangible gifts, but it would seem my butterfly requires a different sort of favor from us this day.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_023舞子や芸子を支援する者を、「旦那」と呼ぶことがあります。
ですが、旦那に求められるのは、金品の援助だけではありません。
心を支えることも、旦那の甲斐性のひとつ……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_024<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Might you be so kind as to accompany me to speak with Kototsuru? We may yet be able to convince her to reconsider her decision.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_024)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、私といっしょに、
コトツルに、引退の延期を説得してくれませんか？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_025<tab>She is known to frequent the piers at this time of <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((night)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((night)) /var>)) /var>. I will be along as soon as I have seen to matters around the shop. Thank you, my friend.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_025彼女なら、第一波止場にいるはずです。
店の者に仕事の指示を終え次第、私も合流しますから、
先に「コトツル」を訪ねてください。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_029<tab>Kototsuru may seem cold on the surface, but deep down she has a soft spot for her former apprentice. Surely there is hope for us yet!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_029コトツルに引退の延期を持ちかけてみましょう。
彼女なら、第一波止場にいるはずです。
私も仕事を終え次第、合流します。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_030<tab>Well, if it isn't the adventurer that fool child is always imposing on. Whatever brings you here?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_030あら、)) (( )) 02 /var>はんやないの。
わてに、なにか用ですの？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_031<tab>Kototsuru, you must hear us out! A young girl's very life hangs in the balance!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_031コトツル！
折り入って、依頼したいことがある！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_032<tab>Must you always be so dramatic? You are free to make your plea. Though I, of course, am free to deny it.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_032あらあら、えらい剣幕で、どないしはったん？
聞くか聞かんかは、内容次第どすわ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_033<tab>I beg of you, Kototsuru. Pray postpone your retirement, if only for a fortnight. Say that you will dance at the Kugane-odori one last time!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_033コトツル……引退を延期して、
「クガネをどり」に出てもらいたいのだ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_034<tab>Forgive me, but I believe this life is my own to live. To tell the truth, I have already put off my marriage quite long enough. Though I am getting no younger, I could not very well leave the Hanamachi without knowing I had a worthy successor, one who could lead the flower district for years to come.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_034何かと思えば……。
結婚と引退は、もうずいぶんと延期してもろてたんどす。
わてに代わり得る芸子が、育っておらへんかったからに。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_035<tab>...But things are different now. There is, at last, one who could follow in my footsteps. She is already a favorite of the crowds, and though once she stumbled, she has risen again, with newfound humility to temper her passion. I would step aside and let her take center stage.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_035せやけど、ようやっと後を任せられる芸子が現れおした。
下働きも舞も、ようけ気張るええ子がなぁ……。
そやし、ようやくわても晴れてお役御免どすわ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_036<tab>Meanwhile, the girl of whom you speak is saying that she may never dance again! This is why we have come to you, Kototsuru. You must help us save our butterfly!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_036そのコトチョウが、今、芸の道に迷っているのだ。
だからこそ、姉芸子として厳しく指導してきた貴女に、
あの子を救ってもらいたい。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_037<tab>Whatever would you need of me? You are her patron, are you not? It is you and <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> who have supported her through her most taxing trials, not I.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_037なぜ、わてでなければあかんと思うんどすえ？
「旦那」であるケイメイはんに、
)) (( )) 02 /var>はんかて、いはるやないの。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_Q1_000_000<tab>なぜコトツルの助けが必要？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_A1_000_001<tab>You are what she herself strives to be.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_A1_000_001<tab>コトツルは、コトチョウの目標だから

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_A1_000_002<tab>You are the one who gave her a dream.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_A1_000_002<tab>コトツルは、コトチョウの憧れだから

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_038<tab>We may be her patrons and her friends, but you, Kototsuru─you are the one she always looked up to, and what she herself one day would be. The girl has come far, but she is still a girl. Without you to guide her─to challenge her to be more than who she is today─she is as good as lost.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_038そう……コトチョウにとって、貴女は乗り越えるべき目標。
しかし、引退によって勝負の舞台が消えてしまい、
あの子は自暴自棄になってしまっている。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_039<tab>It is true that we have spared no effort to help the girl realize her dream. But were it not for you, Kototsuru, that dream would never have been born. Without you to guide her─to challenge her to be more than who she is today─she is as good as lost.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_039そうです、コトチョウは貴女の舞を見て、芸子を志した。
だからこそ、最後の勝負を終えぬまま引退となれば、
あの子は心残りを抱き続けるでしょう……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_040<tab>If you would, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>...allow me.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_040いや、ここは舞子時代からあの子を贔屓にしてきた、
「旦那」である私から、説明させてもらうとしよう……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_041<tab>Kototsuru. You are the one who gave the girl her dream, and what she herself would one day be. Without you to guide her─to challenge her to be more than who she is today─she is as good as lost.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_041コトチョウにとって貴女は、
芸子を志した理由であり、乗り越えるべき最大の存在……。
ゆえに今、目標を見失い、自暴自棄になっているのだ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_042<tab>One last chance to share the stage with her idol, to prove herself worthy─this is all my butterfly wants, and if she is deprived of it, it will haunt her for the rest of her days. We beg of you, Kototsuru! Do not abandon the child in her moment of need!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_042あの子に必要なのは、貴女との真剣勝負だけ……。
だからどうか最後に一度だけ、その機会を与えてやってほしい。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_043<tab>You would propose another contest? Be forewarned that I would not take the challenge lightly. If I were to defeat her again, who is to say she would not flee the Hanamachi with her tail between her legs.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_043ふたりとも、いけずやわ……。
わての最後の舞にするからには、勝負には全力で臨みますえ。
これで、あの子がまた負けたら、完全にあかんくなるやもしれんえ？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_044<tab>If that is how it goes, it would only show that she was not ready to carry on your legacy after all. If that is the case, it is better you learn now rather than later, no?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_044……そのときは、コトチョウがそれまでの器だったということ。
中途半端な芸子が、貴女の去った花街に残ったところで、
ものの役には立たない……そうだろう？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_045<tab>Indeed. Harsher words than I would expect to hear from you, Keimei, and yet there is truth in them. Very well. I will acquiesce to your request. You will see me on stage at the Kugane-odori─on one condition.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_045ケイメイはんが、そこまで言わはるなら、よろしおす。
わても、「クガネをどり」に出させてもらいまひょ。
ただし、条件がありますえ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_046<tab>Kotocho and I will don the same dress, and dance the same dance...a dance of my choosing. We shall perform the ancient dance that came to Hingashi from Doma in days long past...the <var 1A 02 /var>tennyo-no-mai<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_046わてとコトチョウ、同じ舞、同じべべで勝負してもらいます。
舞は、ドマより伝わった伝統舞踊……「天女の演舞」どす。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_00047<tab>The dance of an angel lured down from her sequestered home in the sky. But Doman custom dictates that all who dance the tennyo-no-mai must wear...
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_00047「天女の演舞」といえば、
巌にひきこもった天女を宴に誘う勇壮な舞……。
では、もしや用意すべき衣装というのも……

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_048<tab>...A tennyo hagoromo in the classic tradition, of course. Simply nothing else will do. Now, Master Keimei─I trust you will be seeing to my attire as well as that of your precious butterfly, yes?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_048ええ、ドマ風の伝統装束「」がよろしおすな。
コトチョウはもちろん、わてのべべも、
ケイメイはんのご祝儀でっせ？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_049<tab>B-But of course! It would be my─<var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> pleasure, right, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>? You may consider it a wedding present from the both of us to you.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_049もちろん、私からの結婚祝いとしよう。
衣装の製作は、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんに依頼します。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_050<tab>That said, this is quite unprecedented. I cannot recall the last time a dance of ancient Doma was performed at the Kugane-odori, much less a time when two leading geiko performed in identical garb. You seek to level the playing field─to ensure that this is a test of pure skill?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_050「クガネをどり」で、ドマの伝統舞踊を披露することは稀……。
さらに衣装も揃えて、すべての条件を同じにする……。
つまり、芸の技だけで勝負を決めるということだな？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_051<tab>Very astute, Keimei. For all your posturing, at times I look in your eyes and see the man who found me in the teahouses, who bought me my first kimono so many years ago...
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_051そうどす。
さすがは、わてを贔屓にしてくださった先代の倅さんやわ。
ほんなら、コトチョウにあんじょう伝えておくれやす。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_052<tab>Father? Ahem. At any rate, consider all of your conditions accepted, Kototsuru. For all that you have done and will do for my butterfly...I thank you.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_052承知した。
何から何まで、あの子のために本当にありがとう。
後は、私が魅せられたあの子の目を信じるだけだ……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_053<tab>And with that, I should return to the flower district. I look forward to my present, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_053ほな、わてはさっそく稽古に入ります。
)) (( )) 02 /var>はん、べべを楽しみにしてますわ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_054<tab>Well, that went about as well as could be expected. Still, we haven't any time to lose. Let us meet back at the shop─I will send for Kotocho.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_054では、いったん店に戻りましょう。
コトチョウも呼んでおきます。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_059<tab>So we meet again. The young master asked me to come at once. The timing is curious, but it is just as well─there is something I must tell the both of you...
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_059)) (( )) 02 /var>はん、また会いましたな。
なんや、急に若旦那に呼び出されたんどす。
わてからも話があったから、ちょうどよかったわ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_060<tab>It would seem we are all here. Excellent. Kotocho, there is something you must know...
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_060これで全員揃いましたね。
コトチョウ、君を呼んだのはほかでもない。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_061<tab>Wait, young master. Before that, there is something I would say as well─to both of you.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_061若旦那、待っておくれやす。
わても、ふたりに話がありおす。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_062<tab>You have been so gracious with me, lavishing upon me presents I scarce deserved. But I fear I can accept your patronage no longer. Whatever passion for my art I once had burns within me no longer. And so, I will be leaving the flower district...forever.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_062コトツル姉さんは、わての目標……その姉さんに勝つどころか、
勝負もできひんなら、芸子を続ける意味はあらへん。
せやから、わても芸子をやめますえ……！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_063<tab>Wait, my sweet butterfly! Have you not heard the news!? Kototsuru has agreed to give one last performance at the Kugane-odori. What's more, she has issued a personal challenge to you!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_063待ちなさい、コトチョウ。
コトツルが「クガネをどり」を最後の舞台と決めたよ。
君との最後の勝負に挑むために……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_064<tab>Wh-What? Could this be true...!?
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_064<tab>それ、ほんまですの！？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_065<tab>She has, however, given her conditions: the two will perform as one the tennyo-no-mai, the dance of ancient Doma, and do so clad in identical tennyo hagoromo fashioned by <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>'s hand.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_065ただし、)) (( )) 02 /var>さんに依頼した、
同じ衣装をふたりで身にまとい、
ドマの伝統舞踊「天女の演舞」を披露するという条件だ……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_066<tab>Can my ears be believed...? I will not only share the same stage with Kototsuru, but don the same dress...and dance the same dance?
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_066<tab>姉さんと、同じ衣装で同じ舞なんて……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_067<tab>Change of plans, young master─your butterfly will not be retiring after all! After all, we must send Kototsuru off in grand fashion, must we not? <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, might I trouble you with one last commission?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_067若旦那、わての引退はなしや……！
「クガネをどり」で、姉さんに勝って、
晴れやかに姉さんを送り出したる！！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_068<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Those<var 1A 01 /var> are the eyes, burning with passion, that stole my heart that day! We stand by your side as ever, my butterfly. Pray show us the dance of your lifetime, and give Kototsuru the wedding present that only you could provide!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_068フフフ、私が魅せられた、その目が戻ってきたね。
最高の舞で、コトツルの引退を祝福してやりなさい！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_069<tab>Young master, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Words cannot convey my gratitude for all you have done for me! I promise you that this time will be different. No, I will not shirk my training for even a moment. But what am I doing still here? I must begin at once!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_069若旦那、)) (( )) 02 /var>はん、えらいおおきに！！！
ほな、わて、みっちり稽古してくるわ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_070<tab>This will be the final piece I ask of you, friend. I need not impress upon you the gravity of it all. For my part, I can assure you I have spared no expense in procuring the finest of materials.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_070では、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
「」の製作をお願いします。
必要な材料は、大天屋の番頭「ヤギリ」からお受け取りください。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_071<tab>Fabrics of the purest white, so pure one would think they were weaved by the angels themselves. White to symbolize Kototsuru's betrothal, and Kotocho's rebirth.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_071純白の最高級の生地を用意しました。
コトツルの花嫁装束であると同時に、
無から再起するコトチョウのための衣装ですから。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_072<tab>A traditional garment of the East, it will doubtless be unlike any dress you have fashioned before. But I trust in your talent, and all you have learned since coming here to Kugane. I am most looking forward to seeing your hagoromo.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_072完成したら、私まで納品をお願いします。
東方風の衣装は、貴方にとっても挑戦でしょう。
完成を楽しみにしています。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_078<tab>I am heartened to see Kotocho in high spirits again. And I am sure those spirits will only rise higher when she takes the stage with Kototsuru clad in your latest and greatest creation.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_078では、「」の製作をお願いします。
必要な材料は、大天屋の番頭「ヤギリ」からお受け取りください。
完成したら、私まで納品をお願いします。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_079<tab>I am truly sorry for the burden, but I am counting on you, friend. We all are. If all goes well, this year's Kugane-odori will be the stuff of legend.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_079東方風の衣装は、貴方にとっても挑戦でしょう。
完成を楽しみにしています。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_080<tab>Welcome back, friend. I trust you have come for the fabrics the young master has prepared. They are yours.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_080若旦那から、話は聞きました。
最高級の材料を用意いたしましたので、お受け取りを！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_081<tab>The tennyo-no-mai, as Doman legend has it, was first danced to entice an angel down from a castle in the sky in which she had sequestered herself. It is a dance with a storied history─it is not surprising that Kototsuru, with her deep appreciation for tradition, would make such a choice.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_081なんでも、ふたりで「天女の演舞」を披露するとか……。
舞の演目ひとつにも、細やかな心遣いが感じられます。
さすがは、長年花街の頂点に君臨してきたコトツルさんです。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_082<tab>And yet, to my knowledge, it is rarely performed by two dancers in tandem. Doubtless Kototsuru is looking to give the audience at her final Kugane-odori the show of their lives.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_082「天女の演舞」は、巌にひきこもった天女を宴に誘う勇壮な舞で、
「もてなしの心」を表していると伝えられています。
これは宴席で客をもてなす、芸子の心意気にも通じますよね。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_083<tab>It would seem that the veteran has high hopes for Kotocho as well. But can the young butterfly truly live up to her mentor's demanding expectations? I, for one, will be on the edge of my seat.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_083はてさて、姉芸子が込めた心遣いを、
コトチョウさんは、正しくくみ取れるでしょうか？
「クガネをどり」が楽しみです……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_088<tab>The face of the flower district's past, and─if all goes well─the face of its future, together on stage one last time. Throw your masterpiece-to-be in the mix, and I suspect this year's Kugane-odori will be a spectacle like none other.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_088コトツルさんとコトチョウさん……。
ふたりの舞が楽しみなことはもちろんながら、
貴方がこさえた東方の装束も楽しみにしていますよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_089<tab>Your work is done? The young master will want to see it without delay!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_089ついに、完成しましたか！
心待ちにしていた若旦那へ、急ぎお渡しください。
ああ、私もはやく羽衣を見たいものです……！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_090<tab>Is that what I think it is? I knew I could count on you, friend!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_090)) (( )) 02 /var>さんにとっても挑戦となる、
純白の「」を、
楽しみにしています。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_091<tab>...Excellent. I would not spoil the moment by looking upon them here and now. No, I will deliver the dresses to the Hanamachi at once.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_091出来栄えは、「クガネをどり」の舞で確認するとしましょう。
私は、急ぎ、この装束をふたりに届けに行きます。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_092<tab>You have my most sincere gratitude for all that you have done for us. Pray do not miss the festivities─I am quite certain it will be a spectacle for the ages.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_092)) (( )) 02 /var>さんは、「クガネをどり」の会場で、
この装束に身を包んだふたりの登場をお待ちください！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_100<tab>Ah, there you are, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Kotocho and Kototsuru are set to take the stage at any moment now.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_100)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、よかった、間に合いました。
そろそろ「クガネをどり」の大トリ、ふたりの舞が始まります。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_101<tab>Just <var 1A 02 /var>look<var 1A 01 /var> at them, my friend. If such a thing were possible, I could swear that two angels, descended from the heavens, stand before our very eyes.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_101これは……天女が降り立ったのでしょうか……？
羽衣をまとったふたりが、輝いてみえます……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_102<tab>Every glance, every movement in perfect unison...it is as if the two of them breathe as one.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_102ふたりで舞っていながら、
ひとつの魂かのように寸分も違わないとは……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_103<tab>Is this still our mortal world we live in? Pray pinch me, friend, that I might be certain I have not been spirited away to a land of dream and fancy...
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_103現世（うつしよ）で、楽土の演舞に立ち会えた奇跡に、
歓喜の情がわき上がるばかりで、息すら忘れそうです……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_104<tab>...On second thought, stay your hand. For even if we were trapped in a fantasy─never to return whence we came─if I could watch these two for all eternity, I would gladly accept such a fate.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_104もはや、勝負など無粋なことは忘れ、
永遠にこの勇壮な舞の世界にひたっていたい……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_105<tab>I...I have no words for the beauty I just witnessed. It is as if I am lost in a dream from which I hope never to wake.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_105ふたりとも、お疲れさま。
鶴と蝶が誘う楽土の演舞に酔いしれさせてもらったよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_106<tab>You can thank <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> for that. From the moment I wrapped myself in this hagoromo, it was as if I had truly transformed into an angel.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_106)) (( )) 02 /var>はんのべべのおかげどす。
わても、本当に天女になった気分どした。
舞台では姉さんとわての区別が、よおつかんまま舞いましたわ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_107<tab>In all my years on the stage, I have never felt as I did this day. It was as if our bodies and souls were one─I knew not where one of us ended and the other began. And to think that I almost left the Hanamachi without ever having experienced the rapture of this night...
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_107わてもどす……過去いちばん幸せな時間どした。
コトチョウのおかげで、最高の舞台で芸子人生を締められましたわ。
コトチョウ、わての厳しい指導に、よおついてきてくれはったな。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_108<tab>...Kototsuru. Forgive the headstrong, foolish girl you knew. And know that the woman who stands before you understands all that you have done for me through the years─and thanks you from the bottom of her heart.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_108姉さんこそ、わてのために、ずっと気張ってくれはって、おおきに。
姉さんのもてなしに気付くの遅おなって、かんにんな。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_109<tab>It would appear our contest has ended in a draw, but I would have it no other way. Once I dreamed of the day when I would surpass you, but today, a new dream is born inside of me.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_109勝負はおあいこ、姉さんに勝つ夢はまた破れてしもたけど、
わて、新しい夢ができたわ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_110<tab>All that you have given me, I will share with those around me. The young master, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, and all those in Kugane─citizen and wayfarer alike─who would honor me with their patronage.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_110姉さんからもろたたくさんの心遣いを、若旦那や、
花街のお客さんへのおもてなしで返していきますえ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_111<tab>The flower district will be in safe hands. Farewell, my dear sister, and may happiness fill the rest of your days.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOCHO_000_111<tab>せやから姉さん……ようけ幸せになっておくれやす。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_112<tab>Thank you, my dear. But let us save the farewells for the proper occasion, shall we? Or is the shining star of the Hanamachi in such demand that she would refuse an invitation to perform at my ceremony?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KOTOTSURU_000_112おおきに。
これからの花街を、よろしくお頼みおす。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_119<tab>Ah, but that was simply enchanting, was it not!? ...Oh. If you must know, I stole away from the stall for a moment to catch a glimpse of Kotocho and Kototsuru up close. You won't tell the young master, will you?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_YAGIRI_000_119ふたりの勇壮な舞を見るのは、至福のひとときでしたね。
なにより、貴方の羽衣がふたりをいっそう輝かせていました。
匠の技の真骨頂ここにあり、と心震えたものでした……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_120<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. You truly outdid yourself this time. I have not the words to convey the full depths of my gratitude.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_120)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、
今回も、素晴らしい衣装を、ありがとうございます。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_121<tab>With Kototsuru's retirement, the changing of the guard is complete. Kotocho will assume her place atop the ranks of the geiko, where she will lead the flower district into a new era. Great changes are coming, no doubt, but I am confident my butterfly is up to the task. After that ethereal performance, word has it all in the Hanamachi feel the same.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_121勝負は引き分けでしたから、今後の花街は、
コトツルに代わり、コトチョウが背負っていきます。
コトチョウは、コトツルに並ぶ芸子と認められたのです。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_122<tab>I spoke with the girl just before you came. She says that, henceforth, she intends to perform in both the Eorzean dresses you fashioned for her, and the traditional kimono handed down to her by Kototsuru.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_122あの子が言うには、今後はコトツルから譲り受けた着物と、
)) (( )) 02 /var>さんに仕立てていただいたドレス、
その両方に身を包み、お客さんをもてなしていくそうです。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_123<tab>In this way, she says, she would usher the flower district into the future, while taking care never to lose sight of the traditions of the past. Oh, how the girl has grown!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_123コトツルが守った伝統と、コトチョウが吹き込んだ新風、
ふたつを合わせて、花街を背負う覚悟の表れでしょう。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_124<tab>...My apologies. It is unlike me to get so emotional. And this, I do believe, marks the most successful conclusion of our contract. Thank you, my friend, and rest assured that my butterfly will see that your sublime fashions do not go to waste.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_124)) (( )) 02 /var>さんとの契約は、
これにて、ひとまず満了となります。
コトチョウのために、数々の傑作をありがとうございました。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_125<tab>I do hope that your sojourn in Kugane has been a fruitful one. After all, mayhap your countrymen in Eorzea might take interest in Hingan fashions, as we have taken an interest in yours? But forgive me...this is but a humble suggestion. Till our paths cross again, safe travels, my friend!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR700_02435_KEIMEI_000_125クガネにお越しの際は、大天屋にもお立ち寄りくださいね。
店の者や、コトチョウとともに、心を込めてもてなします！
